member.name: HTTP_SERVICE_CONFIG_IP_LISTEN_QUERY
member.summary: TheHTTP_SERVICE_CONFIG_IP_LISTEN_QUERY structure is used by to return a list of the Internet Protocol (IP) addresses to which the HTTP service binds.

member.name: HTTP_SERVICE_CONFIG_IP_LISTEN_QUERY.AddrCount
member.summary: The number of address structures in the AddrList array.

member.name: HTTP_SERVICE_CONFIG_IP_LISTEN_QUERY.AddrList
member.summary: An array ofSOCKADDR_STORAGE structures that contains IP addresses in either IPv4 or IPv6 form. To determine what form an address in the list has, cast it to a SOCKADDR and examine the sa_family element. If sa_family is equal to AF_INET, the address is in IPv4 form, or if it is equal to AF_INET6, the address is in IPv6 form.
